label: IndividualTTAnimal
comment: A Track and Trace (TT) animal, such as one kept or raised on a farm, ranch.

objectProperties.comment: The birth date for this individual TT animal.
The death date for this individual TT animal.
The identifier for this TT animal, such as the number appearing on an animal ear tag.
The delimited period specified for this individual TT animal.

referencedBy.comment: The individual tracking animal specified for this TT animal.
